critique: This document is an executive order transferring land from the War Department to the Tennessee Valley Authority (TVA). The TVA was created as part of the New Deal, a liberal initiative. Transferring land to the TVA could be seen as supporting this initiative. The order itself doesn't directly address immigration, executive power, federalism, national security, economic regulation, or social inclusion. However, the TVA itself is an example of federal involvement in the economy and regional planning.
